scripts.svelte-prod: VITE_FASTIFY=true VITE_API=http://0.0.0.0:3000/api npm --prefix ../svelte-app run build && npm --prefix ../svelte-app start
scripts.start-svelte-dev-swa: concurrently "npm start" "VITE_FASTIFY=true VITE_API=http://0.0.0.0:4280/api npm --prefix ../svelte-app run dev" "npx @azure/static-web-apps-cli@latest start http://localhost:5001 --api-devserver-url http://0.0.0.0:3000 --verbose"
